objective: Audit the application for security vulnerabilities.

sub_agent.name: security-scanner
sub_agent.purpose: Perform static security analysis for vulnerabilities
sub_agent.use_when: Need to scan for OWASP Top 10, hardcoded secrets, injection flaws

sub_agent.name: dependency-auditor
sub_agent.purpose: Audit dependencies for CVEs and license issues
sub_agent.use_when: Need to check for vulnerable or problematic dependencies

delegation_guidance.parallel_tasks: Security scanning and dependency auditing can run in parallel as they examine different attack surfaces (code vs dependencies).

instructions: 1. Review code artifacts and dependency manifests. 2. Use the orchestrator skill to plan security audit. 3. Delegate to sub-agents in parallel: - security-scanner: Code-level vulnerability analysis - dependency-auditor: Dependency CVE and license analysis 4. Aggregate findings into comprehensive security report. 5. Check for common vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10). 6. Review authentication and authorization logic. 7. Recommend security fixes with priority ratings. 8. Output security audit report with remediation steps.
